umbrellas.name: Technology
umbrellas.definition: software, hardware, AI, computing, and devices

umbrellas.name: News
umbrellas.definition: journalism, reporting, and current events
umbrellas.exclusion: product tutorials or how-to without reporting

umbrellas.name: Gaming
umbrellas.definition: video games, gameplay, reviews, esports

umbrellas.name: Film & TV
umbrellas.definition: movies, TV shows, trailers, reviews

umbrellas.name: Music
umbrellas.definition: music performance, lessons, and production

umbrellas.name: Photography
umbrellas.definition: photography techniques and gear
umbrellas.exclusion: primary focus on video editing software

umbrellas.name: Video Editing
umbrellas.definition: editing and color grading of video
umbrellas.inclusion: Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, After Effects

umbrellas.name: Education
umbrellas.definition: teaching and learning across subjects

umbrellas.name: Lifestyle
umbrellas.definition: daily life, vlogs, productivity, self-help
umbrellas.exclusion: news, politics, or niche pro fields

umbrellas.name: Sports
umbrellas.definition: sports news, analysis, and competitions

umbrellas.name: Business
umbrellas.definition: entrepreneurship, marketing, and business strategies

umbrellas.name: Health & Fitness
umbrellas.definition: physical health, nutrition, and wellness

umbrellas.name: Cooking
umbrellas.definition: food preparation, recipes, and culinary arts

umbrellas.name: Travel
umbrellas.definition: travel experiences, destinations, and adventure

umbrellas.name: Science
umbrellas.definition: scientific research, discoveries, and explanations

umbrellas.name: History
umbrellas.definition: historical events, figures, and analysis

umbrellas.name: Comedy
umbrellas.definition: humorous content, sketches, and entertainment

umbrellas.name: Automotive
umbrellas.definition: cars, motorcycles, and vehicle maintenance

umbrellas.name: Home & Garden
umbrellas.definition: home improvement, gardening, and DIY projects

umbrellas.name: Finance
umbrellas.definition: personal finance, investing, and money management

umbrellas.name: Politics & World News
umbrellas.definition: Reporting and analysis on domestic politics, geopolitics, government, and global affairs.
umbrellas.inclusion: elections, policy, diplomacy, conflicts, international relations

umbrellas.name: Business & Markets News
umbrellas.definition: News focused on the economy, companies, investing, and financial markets.
umbrellas.inclusion: earnings, macroeconomy, inflation, interest rates, equities, startups
umbrellas.exclusion: personal finance how-tos or long-form investing education

umbrellas.name: Tech & Science News
umbrellas.definition: News coverage of technology companies, products, research, and scientific developments.
umbrellas.inclusion: AI breakthroughs, product launches, lab results, journal coverage

umbrellas.name: Consumer Tech & Gadgets
umbrellas.definition: Reviews and coverage of phones, laptops, cameras, and everyday devices.
umbrellas.inclusion: unboxings, feature rundowns, comparisons, buyer guides
umbrellas.exclusion: PC building benchmarks; developer coding tutorials

umbrellas.name: Programming & Software Dev
umbrellas.definition: Coding tutorials, frameworks, APIs, and developer tooling.
umbrellas.inclusion: languages, frameworks, devops, backend/frontend, code walkthroughs
umbrellas.exclusion: general gadget reviews or PC part builds

umbrellas.name: PC Hardware & Builds
umbrellas.definition: PC parts, performance tuning, and workstation/gaming builds.
umbrellas.inclusion: benchmarks, GPUs/CPUs, thermals, cases, cooling, overclocking
umbrellas.exclusion: camera/phone gadget reviews; pure game content

umbrellas.name: AI Tools & Productivity
umbrellas.definition: Practical use of AI assistants and tools to get work done.
umbrellas.inclusion: prompting, workflows, productivity, AI app roundups
umbrellas.exclusion: ML research papers; theoretical AI alignment

umbrellas.name: Academic Courses & Lectures
umbrellas.definition: Structured lectures and course material from academic-style educators.
umbrellas.inclusion: curriculum-based series, classroom-style lectures, textbook-aligned units

umbrellas.name: How-To & Skills Tutorials
umbrellas.definition: Practical step-by-step guides for general skills and crafts.
umbrellas.inclusion: non-academic tutorials (writing, design, soft skills, tools)
umbrellas.exclusion: programming (see Programming & Software Dev); video editing (use Video Editing)

umbrellas.name: Study Skills & Test Prep
umbrellas.definition: Techniques and resources for studying, exams, and certifications.
umbrellas.inclusion: memorization, spaced repetition, test strategies, SAT/ACT/MCAT/Bar/Certs

umbrellas.name: Weather
umbrellas.definition: Forecasts, meteorology, storm tracking, and severe weather coverage.
umbrellas.inclusion: daily/weekly forecasts, storm outlooks, hurricane/tornado tracking
umbrellas.exclusion: climate policy debates (use Politics & World News) or earth science explainers (use Science)
